topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 :  from Crypto.Util.number import getPrime
 from gmpy2 import invert
 from libnum import s2n
 from secret import flag
 p = getPrime(2048)
 q = getPrime(2048)
 n = p * q
 d = getPrime(64)
 e = invert(d, (p - 1) * (q - 1))
 c = pow(s2n(flag), e, n)
 print(f"n = {n}")
 print(f"e = {e}")
 print(f"c = {c}")
